title: If My Wife Hates Her I Have To Hate Her Too
itunes:title: If My Wife Hates Her I Have To Hate Her Too
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley. My wife had a friend that she was friends with for many years and she stopped being her friend because a non-credible person told my wife that her friend was talking about her. My wife fell out with her friend and since then, she talks bad about the friend and she gets mad if I tell her what she’s saying is not true. I learned quickly to take my wife’s side and I even added a few choice words about the old friend, so my wife would think I was on her side................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
